name: Runity (KeriDev)
description:
Runity is a small endless-runner game where you have the control of gravity and you can use it to avoid obstacles and obtain gems, which you can use to unlock different themes during the gameplay. The game also features three different modes (exclusive to the full version): 20s (intended for the 20 Second Game Jam), fast mode and blind mode.

The web game showcased is the 20 Second Game Jam version. If you want to play the full one, download the game below.

Controls: Use space or click the screen to change gravity.

Developer's note: This is my first ever indie game. My intention was to make a small, yet entertaining game, and I believe I made that work, although it could definitely be better. Also, for a reason I do not know, Windows' firewall and anti-viruses could detect this game as a virus, however, that is not true and it's completely free of any malware. If you do not trust me, you can still try the web version.

Credits are reserved to Abstraction and Kenny for some of the music and sprites shown in the game.
